oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Pvt. Carlton [Carleton] H. Randall. Batry. B, 114th F.A., 30th Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Carlton [Carleton] H. Randall served in Batry. B, 114th F.A., 30th Div. The 114th had previously been Batry. B, 1st Tenn. Artillery of the Tennessee National Guard. Batry. B consisted primarily of men from Hamilton County, Tennessee. Randall was wounded in action and died of his wounds on October 28, 1918. In the photograph, probably taken at Camp Sevier, South Carolina, Randall is shown holding the Battery's guidon.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Randall, Carlton H.
